responses: Welcome to University Help Desk! How may I assist you today?
Hello! How can I help with your university query?
Good day! What information do you need?
Thank you for contacting University Help Desk!
Goodbye! Come back if you have more questions.
Our standard requirements include: High school diploma, 3.0 GPA minimum, and SAT/ACT scores. International students need TOEFL/IELTS.
You'll need to submit: 1) Application form 2) Transcripts 3) Test scores 4) Personal statement
Requirements vary by program. Shall I check specifics for your intended major?
Undergraduate tuition is $15,000 per semester. Housing and meals average $5,000/semester.
We offer need-based and merit scholarships. Would you like our financial aid checklist?
Tuition varies by program. For accurate figures, may I know your intended degree level (BS/MS/PhD)?
Fall semester begins August 28. Key dates: Orientation (Aug 25-27), Add/Drop ends Sept 5.
Our academic calendar shows: Spring term (Jan 15-May 5), Summer (June 1-July 30). Need a PDF copy?
Registration opens April 1 for fall, November 1 for spring. Current students get priority windows.
You can search faculty contacts at our online directory: university.edu/directory. Need a specific department?
Admissions Office: 555-123-4567 (Mon-Fri 9AM-5PM). For faculty, may I know the department name?
Our staff directory includes office hours and emails. Shall I look up someone specific for you?
